model

Interface UsesAlphabet

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Caesar, FrequencyAnalyzer, SimpleSub

    public interface UsesAlphabet
    Author:
    Peter Vukas Indicates the alphabet is associated to the class in some way, and contains tools assocaited with this

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String alphabet
      The alphabet in string format
      static char[] staticAlphabet
      The alphabet as a char array

      Checks a string to see if it is an alphabet

      • alphabetCheck

        default boolean alphabetCheck(java.lang.String alphabet)
        Checks a string to see if it is an alphabet

        Returns:

      • rangeCheck

                 throws InvalidTextException
        Checks if this char array contains only capitalized alphabetical values

        Throws:
        InvalidTextException - THrown if an invalid character is found.
